channel.title: How to get Minecraft 1.8 For free!
channel.description:
Hi Minecrafter's!
this is how to get minecraft 1.8 for FREE! :)
first of all download this : http://assets.minecraft.net/1_8-pre/minecraft.jar
for the server: http://assets.minecraft.net/1_8-pre/minecraft_server.jar
Now follow these instruction's :
[size=12pt][glow=red,2,300][shadow=red,left]1. Press Start And search for %appdata% 2. Now click Roaming 3. Open .minecraft/bin 4. Now put the minecraft.jar that u downloaded earlier ^^^^ and drag it into that file! 5. Your Finished!!! go and open minecraft and happy 1.8 people![/shadow][/glow][/size]
[size=18pt][glow=blue,2,300]Picture's! [/glow][/size]
[img]http://file-hosterz.comxa.com/uploads/1.8%20minecraft%20spash%20screen.png[/img] [img]http://file-hosterz.comxa.com/uploads/game%20modes.png[/img] [img]http://file-hosterz.comxa.com/uploads/minecraft%20title%20page.png[/img] [img]http://file-hosterz.comxa.com/uploads/multiplayer.png[/img]
[glow=red,2,300][shadow=red,left]From Your's Truly Mark :)[/shadow][/glow]

Hi Minecrafter’s!

this is how to get minecraft 1.8 for FREE!

first of all download this : http://assets.minecraft.net/1_8-pre/minecraft.jar

for the server: http://assets.minecraft.net/1_8-pre/minecraft_server.jar

Now follow these instruction’s :

[size=12pt][glow=red,2,300][shadow=red,left]1. Press Start And search for %appdata%
